attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2007-0262

Date: 2007-03-01

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Robert A. Wright, Deputy Minister of Finance, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($245,100 - $288,400), effective June 12, 2006.


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil fixe le traitement de Robert A. Wright, Sous-ministre des Finances, conformément à l'annexe ci-jointe, lequel traitement se situe dans l'échelle salariale

(245 100 $ ‑ 288 400 $), à compter 12 juin 2006.
